Name: Basil
SeedDescription: Plant these in spring. Takes 5 days to mature.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plántalas en primavera. Tardan 5 días en madurar.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanze sie im Frühling. Wächst in 5 Tagen heran.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.hu: Ezeket tavasszal ültesd el. 5 napig tart megérniük.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: 春植えの作物。そだつのに5日かかる。
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante-as na primavera. Demora 5 dias para amadurecer.
